name: Monster Tim
description:
MONSTER TIM

Tim is a lonely and shy boy who has a very special friends only.... the monsters that live in his dreams. In that oniric place, he feels truly safe and happy in the company of those fantastic creatures. But suddenly, one night, the monsters disappear!

Help Tim in his adventure to find his friends, explore with him fantastic worlds in this funny puzzle game and discover the mystery behind Tim's dreams!

Monster Tim includes:

5 cute worlds to explore and complete!

4 nice monsters with unique skills!

A mysterious story about... discover it!

And puzzles everywhere!

Game Programmers:
Rafael Álvaro
Jose Romagosa
Javier Larraz

Game Artists:
María Pérez
Máximo Aroca
Luis Míguez

Game Designers:
Javier Valle
Ignacio Barandela
Carlos Casado
Gonzalo López
